alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Randolph; Upshur (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Randolph, east central Upshur and southeastern Barbour Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elkins, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elkins, Mill Creek, Dailey, Beverly, Junior, Womelsdorf (Coalton), Huttonsville, Bowden, Kerens and Ellamore. This includes Route 33 between mile markers 31 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
